title: Controller Axis Configuration
description: Configuration for a single controller axis (matches DriveteamControllerAxisJson.java)

channel.description: Channel number of the axis on the controller (0-5 for analog, 0-11 for buttons)

deadband.description: Minimum value threshold for the axis to register motion (0.0-1.0)

invert.description: Whether the axis should be inverted

scale.description: Scaling factor for the axis output

curvePower.description: Mathematical power to apply for curved axis response (1.0 = linear)

limit.description: Absolute maximum limit value for the axis (0.0-1.0)

rate.description: Slew rate limiting for the axis (0.0 = no limit)
